message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500.  I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $10,800 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to consider $11,000?
